inventory.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent[human]] REGROUP (PP[locative]) NP1[agent[human]] REGROUP PP[temporal] NOTE: [human] also entails organizations or groups made up of human entities.

sense.name: Organize anew, as after a setback; collect or compose oneself.
sense.examples: The army regrouped after the devastating attack. I regrouped, brushed my hair back, and returned to the party. The Taliban regrouped in parts of Afghanistan earlier this month.

sense.name: Reorganize into new groups.
sense.examples: I'd like to regroup these examples... perhaps by publishing strategy instead of a list of what is being published. The Reserve Bank of India on Thursday regrouped the asset financing non-banking financial companies (NBFCs).
